text: Did not (the) information/news come to them (about) those from before them, Noah`s nation, and Aad , and Thamud and Abraham`s nation, and owners (of) Madya/Madyan, and the overturned cities ?Their messengers came to them with the evidences, so God was not to cause injustice to them/oppress them, and but they were themselves causing injustice/oppression
